doc.field: Bert Hansen collection of advertising fans
Bert Hansen collection of advertising fans
BH-026. Antique single piece with wood handle, only foreign example
BH-026. Antique single piece with wood handle, only foreign example

Shaped like a feathered fan. From Spain, the only non-American fan in the collection. Painted to look like a feathered fan, including a black-and-white portrait photograph of the actress Marion Davies. Publicity for remedy Digestona Chorro from Gabriel Ruiz Chorro, in the town of Elche in Spain. Printer: Union Bolsera Madrilena. Text is in Spanish.
